ItemTooltips.phase_boots: This build exploits the MS bonus from Witchcraft by getting lots of MS items to allow Death Prophet to always be in a safe position instead. Knowing how to use Crypt Swarm from max range is crucial here.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: The tankyness build simply stacks HP and mana regen items, and survives by "brute force".
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: You can disassemble Arcane Boots to get back the Energy Booster for the Bloodstone.

AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_carrion_swarm: Crypt Swarm has a very long range, especially if you target ground.
AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_silence: Silence can be used for confusion. A silenced enemy will have to stop to think what to do next.
AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_exorcism: Exorcism ghosts move between you and their target and will tend to focus whoever you attack. For best results, stand close to your intended target and be attacking it before you cast the Exorcism.
